title: Ep. 938 - The Breaking Bad Rule
description:
Insurrectionist Jimmy Carter rejects the results of the 2016 election, a BLM leader is sentenced to six years in prison for illegally registering to vote, and Joe Rogan tries to placate the mob.
Check out my shop page to purchase shirts, stickers, and books (one with words, one without) https://utm.io/uedo1
My new book ’Speechless: Controlling Words, Controlling Minds,’ is now available wherever books are sold. Grab your copy today here: https://utm.io/udtMJ
Turn on reminders and tune in for this one-time premiere event of SHUT IN on Thursday, February 10th at 9 PM EST: https://utm.io/uegCX
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
